data.name: Krzyżacy - The Knights of the Cross
data.detailed_description:
Krzyżacy - The Knights of the Cross is a deck strategy game developed by Olive Panda Studio. To provide for player unique Poland custome Hundred years ago and restruct the epic work crafted by Nobel Laureate Hienkiewicz, the game plot has been adapted.
The in-game elite teammates always accompany with brave adventurer.
In the war-torn land of Poland and Lithuania, wondering aroungd many skilled rangers and loners, they might be found on the list; maybe, encounter with them somewhere; maybe, they will receive help from you by accient...... those who will assist with you on the Teutonic Knights resistance.
Shooter, Gunner, Warrior, Mage ......7 different professions with 30 teammates with different personalities, you will write your own epic in one adventure and adventure after another.
You need to make a lot of affecting the overall direction decisions that are unavilable to be changed in the rest of game.
You need to use every card in your hand skillfully to maximize the damage they do to your enemies.
From those seemingly unrelated piles of cards, find the path you want: attack or defense? Support or props? Each card seems to have its own unique effect, but if you try to combine them, you may have a miraculous effect.

data.short_description: Krzyżacy - The Knights of the Cross, a deck strategy game, is the fantastic adventure story of against with Teutonic Knights on the run across Europe at the dawn of Medieval period, which also includes diverse decks, random plots, ups and downs story.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10 需要64位处理器和操作系统
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440 (512M) or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10 需要64位处理器和操作系统
  • Processor: i3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the characters dressed more exposed
